messages.speech:
There are two types of masks which are
available currently:
Surgical/2 ply (Layer) mask: This type of
mask provides one way protection,
meaning a person wearing this mask
cannot spread the virus to other people.
However it does not provide protection to

the wearer from getting infected.
However if enough people wear this mask
(ideally everyone in public and positive
cases at home), we can prevent the
spread of the disease almost completely.
N95 Mask/ N95 Respirator: This 4 ply
mask provides 2 way protection for both
the wearer and the people around the
person wearing the mask. It also provides
protection from aerosols released by a
patient. Therefore it is advised that all
health care professionals treating COVID
19 patients on a daily basis, putting tube
for patients with respiratory distress due
to COVID 19 or testing patients suspected
with COVID 19 (any procedure releasing
aerosols) should use these masks. It is not
advised to be used by general public.
